summary: This is a transcript of the arraignment and bail hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell in the Southern District of New York. A victim, speaking in her true name (which is redacted), addresses the court, detailing Maxwell's abuse and arguing she is a significant flight risk. The government argues for pretrial detention.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case, accused of being a sexual predator who groomed and abused children and young women. The victim's statement details her crimes and argues for her detention.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Presiding judge over the arraignment and bail hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, representing the government in the proceedings.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell from the firm Cohen & Gresser, LLP.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell from the firm Cohen & Gresser, LLP.

persons.name: Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell from the firm Haddon Morgan & Foreman, P.C.

persons.name: Laura A. Menninger
persons.context: Attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell from the firm Haddon Morgan & Foreman, P.C.

persons.name: Jane Doe
persons.context: A victim who provided a written statement read by the prosecutor, expressing fear that Maxwell is a flight risk with international connections.

connections.description: Jane Doe is a victim who provided a statement about Maxwell's flight risk, and the unnamed victim who spoke states she met Maxwell when she was 16 and was groomed and abused by her.
Mark S. Cohen is listed as an attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Christian R. Everdell is listed as an attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Jeffrey S. Pagliuca is listed as an attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Laura A. Menninger is listed as an attorney for the defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Audrey Strauss, as U.S. Attorney, is prosecuting the case against defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Maxwell Arraignment and Bail Hearing
events.description: Court proceeding for the arraignment and bail determination of Ghislaine Maxwell. A victim addresses the court, and the government argues for pretrial detention based on flight risk.

keyFacts: A victim of Ghislaine Maxwell addressed the court in her true name (redacted in transcript), stating she met Maxwell at age 16 and that Maxwell is a sexual predator who groomed and abused her and countless others.
The victim and another victim (Jane Doe) argued Maxwell is a significant flight risk due to her international connections, means, and demonstrated contempt for the legal system (perjury).
The government was seeking pretrial detention for Maxwell, focusing on flight risk, not danger to the community.
The document shows the formal legal team representing Maxwell at her initial court appearance, including attorneys from two law firms.
